description: Episode number 2 of Series "Life goes to the movies". Discusses Hollywood's studio magnates and some of the 1939 spectacular films. Shows the industry's was effort contribution via propaganda films, the creation of symbolic heroes and stars' entertainment of the troops. Hosted by Henry Fonda and Shirley MacLaine.
